meanings.definition: A word or phrase formed by rearranging the letters of another word or phrase.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy solving anagrams in the newspaper.
meanings.sent2: She quickly solved the anagrams in the puzzle book.
meanings.sent3: The anagrams in the game were tricky but fun to figure out.
meanings.sent4: The anagrams of my name revealed some interesting combinations.
meanings.sent5: The anagrams challenge at the party was a hit with everyone.
